description.value:
While wearing this pendant, you gain the following benefits. Whenever you make a Death Saving Throw|XPHB, you can change a roll of 9 or lower to a 10, turning a failed save into a successful one.Whenever you roll a Hit Point Dice|XPHB|Hit Point Die to regain Hit Points|XPHB, double the number of Hit Points|XPHB it restores.

Attunement: true

_srdData.name: Periapt of Wound Closure
entries: While wearing this pendant, you gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Life Preservation
entries: Whenever you make a {@variantrule Death Saving Throw|XPHB}, you can change a roll of 9 or lower to a 10, turning a failed save into a successful one.

entries.name: Natural Healing Boost
entries: Whenever you roll a {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB|Hit Point Die} to regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, double the number of {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} it restores.
